outline:
1. reed, stalk, bone, balances
    1. stalk
    2. water-plant, reed
    3. calamus (aromatic reed)
    4. derived meanings
      1. measuring-rod
      2. reed (as unit of measure - 6 cubits)
      3. beam (of scales - for scales themselves)
      4. shaft (of lampstand)
      5. branches (of lampstand)
      6. shoulder-joint
kjv_def: balance, bone, branch, calamus, cane, reed, [idiom] spearman, stalk.
strongs_def: a reed (as erect); by resemblance a rod (especially for measuring), shaft, tube, stem, the radius (of the arm), beam (of a steelyard)
